item.title: Fill out your XFA forms with Master PDF
item.description: The other day I needed to fill out some XFA forms. On the website I was told to use Acrobat Reader ðŸ˜¨… which is not supported on Linux. So I looked for an alternative to work on Debian 10, when I stumbled into this answer on mentioning Master PDF, so I installed it: 1 $ apt-get install master-pdf-editor and you know what? Worked like a charm! ðŸŽ†
